title: [CLIENT] Unable to verify SMS, despite valid phone number.
body: I am trying to verify my phone so I can play clash, but it keeps telling me my phone is invalid, despite my phone being under a legitimate, Canadian carrier. Hopefully this is a temporary bug, but it is annoying I can't start inviting my friends.

replies.body: UPDATE!  We made an adjustment that seems to have resolved this issue for some affected players.  If you were encountering this issue, please try verifying your number again and let us know if you're still having trouble.  Thanks!

Hey guys, sorry to hear this is happening to you!  We looked into one such case of this issue with the Koodo carrier last night and it seems our SMS provider claims the number in question was not a mobile or prepaid line and won't verify it.  I understand how frustrating this is, especially with limited information provided in the error message.  We will be taking a look at how to improve this error messaging to be more informative and I would also encourage you to submit support tickets if you feel you are being prevented from SMS verification in error.
Same story here. Koodo actually in Canada. Submitted a ticket 7 hours ago and haven't had a response.
Update: they told me, after waiting 9 hours for a ticket response, "try entering it correctly, forehead".
